roleset.name: sting, as a bee, causing sharp pain
roleset.note: STING-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, tingle-40.8.2, touch-20-1. (from sting.01-v)
STING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on sting-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1, tingle-40.8.2, touch-20-1. (from sting.01-n)

example.name: headless relative?
example.text: [Takeover-stock traders]-1, stung *trace*-1 by their huge losses in UAL stock...
example.arg: by their huge losses in UAL stock

example.name: with instrument
example.text: The bees stung John with their steely poisoned barbs.

example.name: arg0
example.text: At worst, allergic people can go into shock with the sting of a bee and these are the symptoms which they may display: ...

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Since head lice need blood to live, their stinging of the scalp usually causes itching, which can lead to scabs or blood spots.

roleset.name: covert police operation
roleset.note: STING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from sting.02-n)

example.name: ADJ and arg1
example.text: Again, please remember that Clinton's own attorney general agreed on wiring Monica in a criminal sting on the president

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: Four men charged in police sting on alleged sale of Oxycodone.

example.name: arg2
example.text: but when one gets arrested in a prostitution sting it is buried in the paper ?
